name: whatsapp-clone-fullstack
description: Full-stack WhatsApp Clone with React and Node.js

scripts.build: echo 'Building app...' && npm install --prefix frontend && npm run build --prefix frontend && cp -r frontend/build backend/ && npm install --prefix backend
scripts.postbuild: cp -r frontend/build backend/ || xcopy frontend\build backend\build /E /I /Y
scripts.dev: concurrently "cd backend && npm run dev-sqlite" "cd frontend && npm start"
scripts.install-deps: cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install
